text: Giorgio Ercolani (born 21 February 1926) is an Italian former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Italian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Italy Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome
title: Giorgio Ercolani
